name: Firefight (itch) (shanemakesgames)
description:
REQUIRES TWO GAMEPADS TO PLAY!

This was my AiE student major work for year 2 Game Design, Advanced Diploma.

The objective is to escape a burning building. There are two characters: Charlie, who wields an Axe and August who wields a fire hose. 

CREDITS

Steven Coombe - Programming (C++ and Blueprint)

John Kim - VFX & Lighting - https://www.artstation.com/john_kim
